location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Excerpts of letter No.821, Political from the Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The excerpts relate to Colonel Pelly's conduct following the death of Sayid Thoweynee [Thuwaini bin Said], noting in particular Pelly's 'remarkable coolness, judgement and courage', sharing the Government's thanks for both his conduct and ensuring the safety, lives and property of the British Subjects in Muscat as well as for protecting Sayid Torkee [Turki bin Said].
